DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to list and read all workflows, tasks and related lifecycle workflows resources on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to list and read all workflows, tasks and related lifecycle workflows resources on your behalf.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to list and read all workflows, tasks and related lifecycle workflows resources without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write all lifecycle workflows resources
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, update, list, read and delete all workflows, tasks and related lifecycle workflows resources on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write all lifecycle workflows resources
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to create, update, list, read and delete all workflows, tasks and related lifecycle workflows resources on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all lifecycle workflows resources
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, update, list, read and delete all workflows, tasks and related lifecycle workflows resources without a signed-in user.
